DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : CHINA
DOC.TEXT: Computer Smuggling Reportedly on the Rise : The country ' s personal_computer industry , already dominated by imports , is now being flooded with smuggled computers , the state-run Beijing Youth Daily reported.In an article titled " Smuggling Is Murdering China ' s Computer_Industry , " the paper said imported PCs now account_for 60 % of sales in the Chinese market . But of the imports , about 80 % to 90 % are smuggled , causing tax losses of hundreds of millions of dollars , the paper said . The Electronics_Industry ministry has notified the Customs House to readjust import_duties on computers and other related products .
